"Rossa": "Yo, it's Rossa. What's up."
"I'm gonna teach you about Weapon Enhancement."
"Your weapon and armor efficiency can get better by tempering them."
"It's basically the same for us ARKS, really."
"...Am I right?"
"...Nah, that's not right."
"...Or is it?"
"Anyways, materials! You can use other weapons and stuff as materials to improve your gear. Also, you're gonna need N-Grinders."
"Listen, it'd be a pain in the ass to make you go and find all that stuff just for a lesson,"
"so here, I'll give you plenty of both. Go try Enhancing some stuff at the Item Lab."
